title: AgentTel GenAI
description: GenAI instrumentation dashboard showing LLM calls, costs, and token usage

panels.title: LLM Calls by Model

targets.query: { span.gen_ai.operation.name = "chat" } | select(name, span.gen_ai.system, span.gen_ai.request.model, span.gen_ai.usage.input_tokens, span.gen_ai.usage.output_tokens, span.agenttel.genai.cost_usd)

panels.description: All LLM chat calls with model, tokens, and cost

panels.title: Embedding Calls

targets.query: { span.gen_ai.operation.name = "embeddings" } | select(name, span.gen_ai.system, span.gen_ai.request.model, span.gen_ai.usage.input_tokens, span.agenttel.genai.framework)

panels.description: Embedding model calls with token usage

panels.title: RAG Retrieval
panels.description: RAG content retrieval with source counts

panels.title: Cost by Framework
panels.description: GenAI costs broken down by framework and provider

panels.title: Slow LLM Calls (>5s)

targets.query: { span.gen_ai.operation.name = "chat" && duration > 5s } | select(name, span.gen_ai.request.model, span.gen_ai.usage.input_tokens, span.gen_ai.usage.output_tokens, duration, span.agenttel.genai.cost_usd)

panels.description: LLM calls taking longer than 5 seconds

targets.query: { span.gen_ai.operation.name != "" && status = error } | select(name, span.gen_ai.system, span.gen_ai.request.model, span.agenttel.genai.framework)
